\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	\& {\mathrm{im}(\alpha _0)} \& {\mathrm{im}(\alpha _1)} \& \cdots \& {\varinjlim^{fil}_{\beta < \gamma }(\alpha _\beta)} \& {\mathrm{im}(\alpha _\gamma)} \\
	{P_0 } \& {P_1} \& {P_2} \& {\cdots } \& {P_\gamma } \& {P_{\gamma +1}} \\
	\&\& M
	\arrow[hook, from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow[hook, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow[hook, from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow[hook, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow[hook, from=1-4, to=1-5]
	\arrow[hook, from=1-5, to=1-6]
	\arrow[hook, from=1-5, to=2-5]
	\arrow[hook, from=1-6, to=2-6]
	\arrow[two heads, from=2-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow["{\alpha _0}", from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow[from=2-1, to=3-3]
	\arrow[two heads, from=2-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{\alpha _1}", from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow[from=2-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{\alpha _2}", from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow[from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow[two heads, from=2-5, to=1-6]
	\arrow["{\alpha _\gamma }", from=2-5, to=2-6]
	\arrow[from=2-5, to=3-3]
	\arrow[from=2-6, to=3-3]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
